text: I would really appreciate some small help on this problem I am having with my custom webpage template. I am trying to modify some style attributes of my custom module, but the  module_attribute tag doesn't seem to work for style attributes. This is the code I am using right now inside the template code. The module is working great in the template otherwise and the normal field attributes work just fine to modify, but for some reason, the style attributes won't display. Have any suggestions?

Hello there, is there a way to get a single blogpost via an id? I want to create a custom module with blogposts from different blogs. I was thinking to have a reapeated module field of blog post ids. would that be possible? I cannot find any function for that in the docs.  Thanks in advance

Hi <@U029WCYHMDL> You can use the <https://developers.HubSpot.com/docs/cms/hubl/functions#blog-by-id|blog_by_id function> and the _link field_ to get the content `content_id`

Like this example:
`{% set my_content = content_by_id(module.link_field.url.content_id) %}`

`<img src="{{my_content.featured_image}}">`
Thank you <@U04PEG80NUC>, I will check out the content by id function.
